name: IEEE--2019 The 5th International Conference on Information Management (ICIM 2019)--Ei Compendex and Scopus
content: Publication and Indexing: Each submission will be reviewed by 2-3 reviewers. All accepted papers after proper registration and presentation, will be published in the ICIM 2019 conference Proceedings and reviewed by the IEEE Conference Publication Program for IEEE Xplore, Ei Compendex and Scopus. ++ ICIM2018 - ISBN: 978-1-5386-6146-8; IEEE Xplore Online ICIM2017 - ISBN: 978-1-5090-6304-8; IEEE Xplore Online | Ei-Compendex & Scopus ICIM2016 - ISBN: 978-1-5090-1470-5; IEEE Xplore Online | Ei-Compendex & Scopus
